remarks: A small magma (with two elements) which is not a semigroup. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2020.)
statement:
mgm2nsgrp.s $e |- S = { A , B } $.
mgm2nsgrp.b $e |- ( Base ` M ) = S $.
mgm2nsgrp.o $e |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( ( x = A /\ y = A ) , B , A ) ) $.
mgm2nsgrp $p |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> ( M e. Mgm /\ M e/ SGrp ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d S x y $.
